title: Truth
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Truth par TVXQ
[version romanis√©e]

sarangiran geo pyeossda jyeossda
maebeon ppeonhaji
geu nuga deung tteomin saramdo eopseo
da heunhan yaegiji

han sarameul mannassda
bulgati saranghaessda
tto kkeutnamyeon apassda
geureonde nan

dasi seolleneun iyu
gipge paein sangcheoga
amulji anhdan geol ijeun chaero
dasi tteollineun iyu

na jeongdabeul andamyeon
tto dasi sarangeul hagesseo

sigani gamyeon mudeomdeom haejyeo
daeche nuga geurae
ajik nae simjangeun sara issgo
nae meorineun gieogeul hae
swiul suga eopseo
sarangiran ge

han sarami tteonassda apado
sigane mudyeojyeossda
tto sarangeul chajassda
geureohge nan

dasi seolleneun iyu
gipge paein sangcheoga
amulji anhdan geol ijeun chaero

dasi tteollineun iyu
na jeongdabeul andamyeon
tto dasi sarangeul hagesseo

heeojimyeon apeudan geol
neomu jal almyeonseodo
dasi banbokhago isseo
nawa dareun nugungawa
gateun kkumeul kkumyeonseo
jinsilhan sarangeul chaja

ojik dan hanaui
ne jinsimeul boyeojwo
Hey

dasi seolleneun iyu
nawa talmeun sangcheoreul
nugudeun hanajjeum gajgo sara

dasi kkumkkuneun iyu
dan hanaui jinsilhan
sarangeul nan chajeul ttaekkaji

neol chajeul ttaekkaji
Hey
